featured.text: Students were asked to _____ or rewrite their compositions based on the teacher’s comments.
Of course, in determining overall standards of living of Americans, factors __(40)__ household composition and family size need also to be taken into consideration.

definition.zh_def: 組成，構成；作品，尤其是音樂或文學作品。
definition.en_def: The act or process of combining parts to form a whole; a work of art, especially in music or literature.
definition.example: Her composition for piano won first place in the competition.
